description.value: Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death. Add ultimate restoration to the types of restoration you can provide. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.wN42CBphkUdxOkSv]{Spiritual Restoration}, you can target a creature that died since your last turn to return it to life. The target returns to life with 1 Hit Point and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1}. You can't return the target to life if it died from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{@Localize[AIE.SpellNames.6th.Disintegrate]} or a death effect. The creature gains the other benefits of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.spells.Item.MCr4QxaQYy3MwNY8]{Spirits Within} after it returns to life.
